author: Tim Rogers
title: I Cannot Emotionally Prepare For Final Fantasy VII Remake - Kotaku
description: The Final Fantasy VII Remake is coming in April. I could only watch the first 30 seconds of the new trailer released today before I had to close the tab in fear. I can’t possibly become emotionally ready in time. This video represents my best, most terrible a…

author: Loren Grush
title: A Russian satellite seems to be tailing a US spy satellite in Earth orbit - The Verge
description: A Russian satellite named Kosmos 2542 has positioned itself uncomfortably close to an American spy satellite named USA 245 in orbit around Earth. It’s led space trackers to speculate that the foreign vehicle is inspecting the US spacecraft.

author: Austin Wood
title: Yes, Animal Crossing: New Horizons is limited to one island per console - GamesRadar
description: In case you were wondering if save technology has improved since the GameCube

author: Carl Zimmer
title: Neanderthal Genes Hint at Much Earlier Human Migration From Africa - The New York Times
description: Modern humans may have left the continent as long 200,000 years ago, a new analysis suggests.

author: Gabriel Olano
title: Medical assistance expert urges calm in the face of coronavirus - Insurance Business ASIA
description: No need to be overly stressed or anxious, says veteran of several disease outbreaks, including Ebola in 2014

author: CNA
title: China slams US for travel warning over virus - CNA
description: The United States' decision to raise its warning level for travel to China is not in line with the facts and is inappropriate, a spokeswoman at the Chinese foreign ministry, Hua Chunying, said on Friday on the ministry's website.

author: CNA
title: Major US airlines cancel China flights as government takes action - CNA
description: Delta Air Lines Inc and American Airlines Group Inc decided on Friday to temporarily suspend all remaining U.S.-China flights after the U.S. State Department elevated a travel advisory over concerns about the coronavirus.

author: CNA
title: Got an email about the Wuhan coronavirus? It could be a computer virus - CNA
description: SINGAPORE: Cyber criminals are making use of the Wuhan coronavirus situation to conduct malicious activities, the Singapore Computer Emergency Response Team (SingCERT) warned on Friday (Jan 31).

author: hermesauto
title: Wuhan virus: K-pop boy band Got7's Singapore concert on Feb 22 postponed - The Straits Times
description: SINGAPORE - K-pop boy band Got7's Keep Spinning world tour concert in Singapore on Feb 22 has been postponed due to concerns over the Wuhan virus outbreak, the latest in a series of concerts that have been similarly pushed back.. Read more at straitstimes.com.

author: Shane McGlaun
title: Solar Orbiter set to launch on February 7 - SlashGear
description: A new space mission is set to launch on February 7 and is called the Solar Orbiter. It’s a collaboration between the ESA and NASA. The first launch window for the spacecraft will come on Febr…
